channel.title: Comments on: First cmypitch event a great success

item.title: By: laurenfisher
item.dc:creator: laurenfisher
item.description: I'm really pleased to see Event Elephant do well here. I've used it quite a few times myself and have always been impressed with the service and staff. Cmypitch sounds like a great initiative - well done to all involved!
item.content:encoded: I'm really pleased to see Event Elephant do well here. I've used it quite a few times myself and have always been impressed with the service and staff. Cmypitch sounds like a great initiative – well done to all involved!

item.title: By: facebook-604190280
item.dc:creator: facebook-604190280
item.description: We will do our best<br><br>Appreciate if folks would use crunchbase to keep such stuff updated - makes it easier to track/verify
item.content:encoded:
We will do our best

Appreciate if folks would use crunchbase to keep such stuff updated – makes it easier to track/verify

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: Great stuff! Fergus, will you please keep track of the companies that getting funding so we can see how many deals are closed each quarter?
item.content:encoded: Great stuff! Fergus, will you please keep track of the companies that getting funding so we can see how many deals are closed each quarter?
